Articles.Content:
A simple idea.

Have Colony tech be researchable as end game science(500+ science cost)

Once the basic technology has been researched, you will be allowed to send certain payloads containing necessary resources to other planets or moons. Once an X amount of all resources required, and X amount of kerbals are located within a certain radius of each other, you will have an option [Found Colony] where [Recover vessel] would normally be.

Now you have a colony that can sustain it self with a certain amount of kerbals. Further down the colony tech tree will allow you to collect resources colony. Which will require more missions to planet/moon to deliever the resources to begin the collecting of materials.

Now your colony can sustain life, and is collecting it's own material. Now you can build a vehicle assembly building on your colony, instead of costing money, it will cost X amount of resources, and ship parts will also cost resources, instead of money.

I feel like this would be a really cool mod or addition to the game. It would work well with the mutli star system mod.

add the kolonists mod into the bunch, it even lets you breed kerbals in space.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106103-0-90-Kolonists-v1-0-1-Jan05?highlight=kolonists](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106103-0-90-Kolonists-v1-0-1-Jan05?highlight=kolonists)

works best with MKS/OKS.
